description: Discover Toronto's largest 3D illusion art for an immersive experience! At iArtS Museum, visitors don't just view the art‚Äîthey become part of larger-than-life illusion wonders. Where laughter-filled activities await. Fun for all ages! Capture over 100 photos for lasting memories! In the heart of downtown Toronto!

reviews.title: Do this, it‚Äôs awesome!
text: R‚Äôelle was amazing! Really great activity with the kids and we got wonderful attention from the kind and friendly staff!

reviews.title: Great experience!
text: The views are amazing! Arts were great! Friendly staff and helpful especially R'elle! Thank you for the wonderful experience.

reviews.title: A picture is worth a thousand words
text: I had a great time. For a person who doesn't take much photos I enjoyed every moment of it. R'elle was very helpful in helping us take pictures. She was awesome. I would highly recommend coming here if you want a great photo op experience.

reviews.title: Unique experience! Highly recommend!
text: This is an amazing piece! The curators, Sara and R‚Äôelle, were very helpful! They have shared great tips on how to make our experience more interesting and take fantastic pictures. Thank you!!

reviews.title: Fun experience, great staff
text: Was skeptical about going but mum convinced (forced) me and it was a FUN experience, the staff were great! Special shout out to R‚Äôelle for being a great host

reviews.title: Incredible experience
text: I had an incredible experience there, and I‚Äôm especially grateful to Hana for making it even better. She was not only an excellent guide but also an amazing photographer, capturing all the special moments beautifully. Thank you, Hana, for your outstanding guidance and photography skills‚Äîyou made the experience unforgettable!!

reviews.title: Great place to go with teenagers!
text: I went with my teen daughter and we had a blast taking photos! Big thanks to Sara who helped us taking pictures. If you‚Äôre planning a school trip with teenagers, you should definitely add iArts museum to your planning, they will have so much fun!

reviews.title: Wonderful and very funny experience!
text: It was a fantastic experience! The Kids and also we as adults loved it! A wonderful and great thanks to Sara who explained everything very well and helped us by giving some instructions how's the best way to put yourself in the perfect angle! took wonderful pictures! Thank you very much, we really enjoyed it! Definitely come back to do this again -:)

reviews.title: Creative art experience
text: Very fun and creative experience! Sara helped  us take pictures and was very kind and guiding. Would definitely recommend üëå

reviews.title: Fun photos
text: This was an immersive experience lots of fun for the grandkids They got to use their imaginations and create some unique photos
Star was great, knew the exhibits how to set the photos and how to maximize the phone pics

reviews.title: We had a great time at the iArtS MUSEUM!
text: I visited with my partner and my sister and we had such a good time. We were there for like 2 and a half hours doing silly poses and taking pictures. The staff was amazing, helping us take better pictures and giving us tips on how to pose. I loved the Houdini setup. Definitely a great place to check out with a bunch of friends!

reviews.title: Mind blowing fun. NOTHING else like it!!
text: Really loved how flexible the experience is. It's one thing to interpret art however you want, and then another to become a part of it however you want!! I also love how many different exhibits there are. The water-based Houdini one in particular blew my mind with how the photos turned out. 10/10!!!

reviews.title: MUST GO!!!
text: It was super fun. Amazing pictures with lots of memories. We had a blast, we laughed so much. ü§£ü§£ü§£ü§£ü§£

text: My friends and I just went and had such a blast at IArts Museum!! We took like 118 photos with R‚Äôelle who helped us photograph. Shout out to R‚Äôelle!! reviews.title: Cool illusions!
text: R‚ÄôElle was very helpful with setting up getting just the right pics in the exhibit! It was super fun to go through! I would definitely recommend if you‚Äôre in the area.

reviews.title: Awesome experience!
text: This place was awesome and so much fun!   It truly is a 3D experience as you strike a pose on various staged sets (such as a chess board or the top of a skyscraper) and you use your camera/tripod to take photos.  The staff was amazing (shout out to Sarah for all her help!) and the pictures turned out great‚Ä¶. Highly recommended!

reviews.title: Epic
text: Perfect day for my son's 18th bday with friends. R'elle was an excellent photographer by suggesting and patience with the group. Sara helped me take my own quick pics.  It was an epic day there. So many things to choose.  A fun place fir all ages

reviews.title: Making adventure dreams come true.
text: Immersive 3D illusion, almost lifelike experience . The staff Sarah and Chaya are superb and experts at making the shots lifelike and real. These two ladies are real asset to the museum. They are very patient and guides you  to pose for best shot. Highly recommend this fun activity when visiting Toronto.   Art imitating life experience . Worth your time and easy on your budget. Live it up with iArts Museum‚ù§Ô∏èüîüüíØüëç

reviews.title: Definitely recommend
text: I brought my family, they had a blast!!!
The staff there were so helpful in taking pictures and videos. We would so go again for the new exhibit that's coming out very soon, we cant wait.

reviews.title: FUN & SILLY MOMENTS!
text: R‚Äôelle was very helpful to get us our money shots ‚Ä¶ she was very creative and patient and always smiling ! Chaya was there to assist as well and both were super friendly ! It‚Äôs definitely a very FUN and unique experience to do with a group of friends or family . So happy we found this activity to do . It was very worth our while and we made great memories . For a bunch of 60+ yr old friends , it was nice to be silly even for 2 hrs. A MUST DO for anyone who likes to have fun!

reviews.title: iArtS Museum
text: We were excited to check out iArtS Museum this weekend. So many cool photo-op art installations to check out. We had a great time, definitely fun activity for date night or with family and friends. Such a unique experience worth visiting!
